pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany on the margins of the G20 Summit in Hamburg.

The two leaders discussed a broad range of bilateral and international issues including trade, climate change, NATO and the situation in Ukraine.  The leaders agreed to deepen bilateral cooperation, notably through the coordination of Germany’s current G20 presidency and Canada’s G7 presidency in 2018.

The two leaders reaffirmed their commitment to implementing the Paris Agreement and the timely ratification of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.
